contents: Article 23 (Executives) ① The Sports Council shall have directors and auditors as executives, and the auditors shall be three. Revised 2018. 4. 2., 2021. 7. 5., ② The directors are as follows: 1. 1 chairman, 2. 9 or less vice-chairmen (professional sports, daily sports, school sports, local sports, (including at least one person representing women's sports), 3. International Olympic Committee member of Korean nationality 4. Secretary General, 5. One athlete representative 6. Items 1, 2, 4 and 5 50 or fewer directors, including
